FuncDef: The display dot1x-template command displays all parameter settings of a dot1x template.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a dot1x template number.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 256.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When 802.1X authentication is used, the device and client negotiate parameters through a dot1x template. To check all parameter settings of the dot1x template, run the display dot1x-template command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
